items.title: A Survey on Large Language Models for Code Generation
items.reliability_reason: Peer-reviewed arXiv paper; comprehensive survey of code LLM paradigms and benchmarks
items.importance_reason: Documents HumanEval success rates from single-digit to 95%+; establishes technical feasibility inflection
items.excerpt: LLMs now enable direct translation of natural language into functional code

items.title: Comprehensive Survey of AI-Driven Automated Program Repair and Code Generation
items.reliability_reason: Peer-reviewed arXiv; November 2024; covers bug detection, semantic errors, security
items.importance_reason: Shows research frontier moving from generation to repair—new product category emerging
items.excerpt: Addresses automated program repair alongside code generation

items.title: CodeNav: Beyond tool-use to using real-world codebases with LLM agents
items.reliability_reason: Academic paper on agent capabilities; peer-reviewed
items.importance_reason: Documents shift from tool-use to codebase navigation—enables new agentic products
items.excerpt: LLM agents progressing to navigate real-world codebases, indexing unseen repositories

items.title: AI Code Assistants Market
items.reliability_reason: MarketsandMarkets; established market research firm; methodology and sample disclosed
items.excerpt: AI Code Assistants market expanding from $8.14B to $127.05B by 2032

items.title: AI Code Tools Research Report 2025: Global Market to Surpass $25B by 2030
items.reliability_reason: GlobeNewswire press release citing research; 25.2% CAGR; multiple sources converge
items.importance_reason: Confirms $6.7–8.44B current market; low-code/no-code demand as adoption driver
items.excerpt: Global market to surpass $25 billion by 2030; demand for low-code/no-code platforms

items.title: Cursor raised $100M at $2.6B valuation (TechCrunch)
items.reliability_reason: TechCrunch; named sources; primary coverage of funding rounds
items.importance_reason: 6.5x valuation in 4 months; $4M to $48M ARR in 6 months—validates market timing
items.excerpt: Cursor raised $105M Series B at $2.6B, four months after $60M Series A at $400M

items.title: Codeium raises $150M at $1.25B valuation
items.reliability_reason: TechCrunch; primary coverage; General Catalyst lead
items.importance_reason: Second major round in 2024; capital flowing to AI coding; validates category
items.excerpt: Codeium raised $150M Series C at $1.25B; total funding $243M

items.title: EU AI Act (Regulation 2024/1689)
items.reliability_reason: Official EU regulation; entered force Aug 2024; legal text
items.importance_reason: Creates compliance demand; GPAI providers need documentation, conformity—tools opportunity
items.excerpt: Risk-based framework; provisions phased in Feb 2025–Aug 2027

items.title: General-Purpose AI Code of Practice
items.importance_reason: Voluntary compliance tool—creates market for AI Act compliance software
items.excerpt: Helps developers demonstrate compliance with AI Act safety and transparency

items.title: Survey: The AI wave continues to grow on software development teams
items.reliability_reason: GitHub research; large sample; methodology disclosed
items.importance_reason: 97–99% developer adoption; organizational support varies—gap creates opportunity
items.excerpt: 97% of developers have used AI coding tools; US adoption 99%

items.title: State of AI 2025: How Developers Are Adopting AI Coding Tools
items.importance_reason: Cursor 33% usage, 49% awareness; Zed, Winsurf emerging—IDE shift underway
items.excerpt: Cursor leads at 33% usage; v0 leads code generation at 26.5%

items.title: GitHub Copilot Adoption Trends
items.reliability_reason: Opsera with Accenture data; real usage metrics
items.importance_reason: 81% install day-one; 30% suggestion acceptance; 9.6→2.4 day time-to-PR
items.excerpt: 81.4% installed on first day; 67% use 5+ days/week; 88% of generated chars retained

items.title: Investing in Cursor
items.importance_reason: Top-tier VC thesis on AI coding; validates category and timing
items.excerpt: Cursor as key AI coding investment; Andreessen Horowitz lead

items.title: Cursor Series D - Past, Present, and Future
items.reliability_reason: Company blog; primary source; $2.3B at $29.3B valuation
items.importance_reason: Series D 2025; $100M+ ARR; market leader trajectory
items.excerpt: Series D $2.3B at $29.3B valuation; Accel, Thrive, a16z, NVIDIA, Google
